thread.title: While everyone else is starring at Dakota Fanning’s outfit, we can’t stop gawking at her socks
thread.title_full: While everyone else is starring at Dakota Fanning’s outfit, we can’t stop gawking at her socks

author: Olivia Harvey
title: While everyone else is starring at Dakota Fanning’s outfit, we can’t stop gawking at her socks
text:
While everyone else is starring at Dakota Fanning’s outfit, we can’t stop gawking at her socks Okay, yes — we get it. Dakota Fanning looks amazing in her photoshoot for W Magazine. And as much as we love her sparkly white bell-sleeve top and her 70s vintage floral shorts, can we focus up on those socks ? Fanning’s rainbow knee-high socks are sending us into a tizzy! Paired with those pink and silver platform sandals , we are seeing Miley Cyrus meets Rainbow Brite and are not mad at all.
Althought Fanning looks stunning-as-ever, we must admit — the socks kind of steal the show ! Fanning even added rainbow emojis into her caption in which she stated, “I’ve always dreamed of reading a 70s Penthouse, while wearing rainbow socks.”
Looks like we’re all fans of the footwear, here. Thank you to Lynn and @wmag for including me in your Best Performances Issue! I've always dreamed of reading a 70s Penthouse, while wearing rainbow socks. 
A photo posted by Dakota Fanning (@dakotafanning) on Jan 3, 2017 at 12:09pm PST 
Now, we’re well aware that rainbow socks are not a new invention. As mentioned before, Rainbow Brite has been wearing them for years. What we’re more interested in is the fact that rainbow socks might be on the verge of becoming mainstream. A simple search of #rainbowsocks on Instagram gave us some exciting results.
Here’s YouTube DIY-er Annika Victoria sporting pasted rainbow socks with her handmade bodysuit! They’re subtle but super cute. handmade bodysuit & thrifted jeans and backpack 
A photo posted by Annika Victoria (@littlepineneedle) on Dec 26, 2016 at 7:48pm PST 

And pairing rainbow socks with white ice skates makes you look like a Candy Land queen, which is an aesthetic we’re all about. When I said "last picture of my new skates" I meant second last. Because... rainbow socks. #rainbowsocks #iceskating #⛸ 
A photo posted by Amelia (@dailymeel) on Dec 22, 2016 at 9:37am PST 
Plus, this is a trend that both men and women can get on board with. ฉดใฉไปกับรีวิวถุงเท้ารุ้ง #rainbowsocks แถมลูกค้าหล่อด้วยนะพวกแกรรร #THXSitAsocks #sitasocks #ลูกค้าหล่อบอกด้วย 
A photo posted by SitASocks (@sitasocks) on Dec 7, 2016 at 6:44am PST 
You can find your own pair of rainbow socks at pretty much any department store. But if you choose to do your shopping online, we’ve found a couple of great options.
Start off your rainbow obsession small with these rainbow striped socks from Forever 21 ($2.90) . Forever 21 And then get wild with the Angelina knee-high socks available on Amazon ($3.99+) . Amazon / Angelina 2017 is looking like it’s going to be a bright and happy year. Like Dakota Fanning, do your part by making your feet just that — bright and happy!
